# Integration Testing Examples

Example test cases and scenarios for integration testing.

## ğŸ“š Contents

This directory contains example test cases and scenarios for integration testing MCP Ticketer.

### Planned Examples

#### Basic Integration Tests
- Simple ticket creation tests
- Configuration validation tests
- Platform connectivity tests

#### Platform-Specific Tests
- Linear integration test examples
- GitHub integration test examples
- JIRA integration test examples

#### Advanced Test Scenarios
- Error handling test cases
- Performance test examples
- Security test scenarios

#### Test Data and Fixtures
- Sample test data
- Mock responses
- Test configuration examples
